hero.subtitle:
Shape the future with the YTU Blockchain club
Innovate, learn and lead
hero.description: Get hands-on with blockchain technology through hackathons, workshops, and a global community driving blockchain innovation every day.

about.heading: We learn, we question and we solve.

stats.membersDescription: Growing community of developers, designers, and blockchain enthusiasts
stats.countriesDescription: Global presence with members from across different continents
stats.hackathonsDescription: Competitive events where innovative solutions come to life
stats.projectsDescription: Successful projects launched by our community members

about.description: YTU Blockchain community empowers the enthusiasts and beginners of Web3
about.subtext: We foster learning, collaboration and creativity, ensuring a welcoming environment for all skill levels.
about.mobileText:
Our blockchain club is more than just numbers. We're a community dedicated
to learning, building, and innovating together. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer, there's a place for you here.

projects.heading: Explore Our Blockchain Journey
projects.description: Embark on a journey through the world where innovation, collaboration, and technology converge to redefine the future of the internet.
projects.mobileHint: Tap on a highlighted country to view events

descriptions.nfticket: We won first place among teams experienced in their fields, and a startup emerged from the club.
descriptions.deauth: DeAuth is a tool that makes life easier for remembering passwords.
descriptions.re_farm: We developed a project that brings the ReFi concept into agriculture.
descriptions.tokenstalk: Tokenstalk is a social application that creates chat rooms based on NFT collections and solves the NFT indexing problem in Juno.
descriptions.greedysnap: GreedySnap is a Metamask Snap that gives insights about fee prices, securing 4th place overall and 2nd place in the Snap track.
descriptions.nevo: NEVO enables MaCi voting on Near and received 2 prizes in 2 different tracks.
descriptions.cosmicproof: CosmicProof makes historical data on Cosmos provable using o1js. We took third place as finalists and first place in MinaProtocol and Node101 tracks.
descriptions.marketmaker: MarketMaker took the top spot at the PythNetwork and won a pool prize with the Worldcoin track.
descriptions.orchave: Orchave is a decentralized, instant data oracle that lets users customize APIs and become data providers. We secured 2 prizes in 2 tracks.
descriptions.wisper: Wisper is a p2p chatting application that enables creating chat rooms without needing a trusted chat application by creating a private local blockchain among users.
descriptions.avalanche_summit: Our club members joined the Avalanche Summit in Barcelona.
descriptions.eth_warsaw: Our club members joined ETH Warsaw.
descriptions.eth_lisbon: Our club members joined ETH Lisbon.
descriptions.edcon: Our club members joined EDCON in Montenegro.
descriptions.eth_london: Our club members joined ETH London.
descriptions.sui_basecamp: Our club members joined Sui Basecamp in Paris.
descriptions.tum_blockchain: Our club members joined TUM Blockchain in Munich.

descriptions.cosmicproof: We developed CosmicProof, which makes historical data on Cosmos provable using o1js. Presented at LambdaClass Hackathon in Belgrade, we took third place as Finalist and won first place in MinaProtocol and node101 tracks.
descriptions.orchave: Decentralized, instant data oracle that lets users customize APIs and become data providers. Won top honors at ETHGlobal Brussels with our solution integrating Filecoin and Avail technologies.
descriptions.nevo: MaCi voting solution on NEAR Protocol developed for ETHDam 2023 in Amsterdam, recognized with awards in two separate tracks.
descriptions.marketmaker: Market-making solution that claimed top spot in the PythNetwork track and won the Worldcoin pool prize at ETHGlobal Brussels.
descriptions.wisper: A P2P chatting application enabling trustless chat rooms through private local blockchains, developed for ETHGlobal Brussels.

events.title: join our events shape your future

hero.title: Events Schedule
hero.description: Explore our comprehensive course schedule and join hands-on workshops led by industry experts. Build your skills with practical experience and real-world projects.

location.title: Location Information
location.description: All classes are held at our main campus unless otherwise specified. The EEF104 classroom is equipped with modern facilities to ensure the best learning experience.

course.title: Course Information
course.description: Our courses are designed to provide hands-on experience with modern technologies. Each session includes practical exercises and real-world examples.

roadMap.title: our Web3 Roadmap
roadMap.description: A comprehensive guide to help you navigate the world of blockchain and Web3

dictionary.title: Blockchain Dictionary
dictionary.subtitle: Discover and understand the terminology of blockchain and cryptocurrency world
dictionary.selectTerm: Select a term to see details

footer.description: Pioneering the future of blockchain technology through innovation, education, and community engagement.
